Perceptor:

"Just if the traitor doesn't ask forgiving at Hydras... and bring 
with him a welcome bonus for him or a loyal one beg Hydras pardon for 
you"replied the male"And why are you so bitter????? I expected a 
diferent tone and more when I found out what happen with your bro...."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Wolfenstein : :
> 
> Wolfenstein was still living on his own, since the nWo had 
disbanded and the others had left for Cybertron.
> 
> The comm from Perceptor was an unwelcome reminder that the 
Predacons would still want to kill him.
> 
> He opens a return channel.
> 
> Wolfenstein: What in the pit do you want, Perceptor? Don't tell me 
that the Predacons are still worried about killing a traitor like me?
> 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor:
> 
> Perceptor checked some Predacons' firms and bot that just left 
> Predacons. He spotted Wolfstein and opened his com link and said 
> with an ironical tone "Hello, Wolfstein... long time with out see 
> you in base"
>
